items.title: Stripe payment integration
items.details: Checkout sessions, customer portal, webhook handling, subscription sync

items.title: Quota checking and enforcement
items.details: Chat tokens, images, videos, CVs, slides quota checks with increment functions

items.title: Subscription lifecycle management
items.details: Create, update, cancel subscriptions with webhook-driven synchronization

items.title: Admin API endpoints
items.details: User management, subscription management, analytics endpoints with require_admin

items.title: Admin dashboard UI
items.details: Overview with metrics, user management, analytics, responsive design

items.title: Usage analytics and reporting
items.details: Total users, revenue, usage by type, job stats, per-user usage summary

completed_phases.name: Auth, Users, Plans, Metering (API & DB)
completed_phases.notes: SQLAlchemy models, Alembic migrations, Google OAuth, JWT, full REST API

completed_phases.name: Provider Layer & Chat
completed_phases.notes: OpenAI/Anthropic/Google providers, streaming chat, usage tracking, frontend UI

completed_phases.name: Image Generation (Vertex AI Imagen)
completed_phases.notes: Imagen provider, S3 integration, batch generation (1-4 images), frontend UI

completed_phases.name: Video Generation (Runway/Pika) + Jobs (SQS)
completed_phases.notes: SQS queue, async worker service, SSE streaming, mock video provider, frontend with progress

completed_phases.name: CV Maker (Export DOCX/PDF)
completed_phases.notes: python-docx for DOCX, Playwright for PDF, comprehensive CV form, S3 storage, 7-day URLs

completed_phases.name: Slide Maker (Export PPTX/PDF)
completed_phases.notes: python-pptx for PPTX, Playwright for PDF, AI-powered outline generation, dual-mode UI

completed_phases.name: Plans, Quotas, Admin Dashboard & Payments (Stripe)
completed_phases.notes: Stripe integration, quota enforcement, admin API endpoints, analytics dashboard, subscription lifecycle
